attributes.action: Try by 2030 to create a digital book to reduce paper waste
attributes.additional_details: Because too many trees are cut down and there would be a massive decrease if every school we to obtain these
attributes.background: Using the concept of an iPad try have a cover of a normal book however when you open it you have a screen and there are files for each subject so you can work on a screen instead of wasting paper

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Developing new technology is a matter for technology companies, not the UK Government or Parliament. There are already a range of technologies that exist that could perform the functions you outline in your petition.
